amendment.description: Amendment makes technical and conforming changes to project- related provisions in the bill and authorizes or modifies additional projects.
amendment.purpose: Amendment numbered one printed in House Report 108-282.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Duncan amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Duncan.
